title: Enough with the Flirting
summary:
Upon opening my eyes after a bus accident, I found myself in the fantasy world of a web novel I enjoyed reading… the only catch is, I reincarnated twenty years before the novel begins! Reborn as Princess Yerenica of the small Lebovny kingdom, I'm determined to change the future in order to prevent the series of unfortunate events that will soon occur. In the original story, my older sister, Tejavia, is pregnant with the future female lead, when she's suddenly kidnapped by the Belgoat Empire's emperor. But in my desperate attempts to protect her, I got kidnapped instead! And as if that wasn't bad enough, my body is ridiculously weak to magic. But… strangely enough, whenever I'm by the emperor, I feel fine! The only way to save the emperor, who's destined to die at the hands of his own son after marrying the villainess, and save myself from being afflicted by magic… is for us to marry!  
  
"Marry me, Father."  
  
"'Father?' Princess, I haven't married yet, nor do I have any kids…"  


---

title: Useless Cinderella’s Feeble Attempt to Save the Kingdom
The Deacon of God
summary:
For the past millennium, the Kyougane Clan has stood as an infamous bloodline of fiend-slaying exorcists. In the present day, it's led by the sharp-tongued and unyielding head, Kyougane Kurou. One day, a stunning young bride is brought before him—but beneath her beauty lies a hidden, dangerous secret.

Determined to stand by her side, Kurou must now sever the shackles of fate to protect their bond—no matter the cost.

Exquisitely drawn by Anju Hino, the manga artist behind "My Unexpected Marriage", comes a matrimonial tale of romance, battles, and fantasy!

(Source: Manga UP! Global)

title: I’m retiring from the role of a wife!
summary: Ayukawa Honami (30), once a child prodigy who took the entertainment world by storm, has now retired from show business and is living a happy married life as a mother of one. At the urging of her husband, who runs a talent agency, she allows her daughter to debut as a child actor. However, during a commercial shoot, her daughter becomes entangled in a troubling incident. When Honami discovers that the accident was caused by her husband's infidelity and a grudge from her own child actor days, she decides to make a comeback as a star actress. What follows is a grand tale of revenge that engulfs the entire entertainment industry.

title: Marriage of Convenience 2: An Unforgettable Song
Transcension Academy
summary:
After a hundred years of monsters, it’s become the norm to train at hunter academies if you want to become a professional monster hunter. And that’s just what hard-working orphan Seojun Kim dreams of.

But after a freak accident dashes his hopes, ads for the mysterious Transcendent Academy pop up on his phone, offering him a chance to train virtually with history’s most legendary warriors. As he levels up, he’s soon caught up in the world of hunter academies, dungeon raids, and competitive tournaments.

But the more he learns, the more questions he has about the people surrounding him, his past, and the secrets of the Transcendent Academy.

title: The Masters Are Subscribing To Me
summary:
There are three female masters who are known to be the strongest in the world. The only thing they can’t get their hands on… their ideal man.

“If there are no ideal men, why not raise one ourselves!?”

As they skim over the list of candidates, the ladies' eyes all fixate on one boy. A level 0 with no shred of talent…
___
**Character Designer:** [Tajima Ryuushi](https://mangadex.org/author/3ac15f57-6a12-4018-b549-30aab86fc6c8)

title: Serpent Ancestor
summary:
In a village, an old snake inadvertently swallowed a cultivator's human-shaped pill, gaining intelligence and setting off on the path of cultivation. With only a brief decade to live, the snake does not fear the passing of time but makes the most of every moment.

This is the tale of an old snake's journey to immortality.

title: Magic Lord
summary: A man was reincarnated as Van, a boy of noble birth, who grew up to become a child prodigy through hard work. But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic," he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However, his magic, which was called useless, turned out to be truly extraordinary, capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic, the small, poor village will grow to become into a great city.

title: Auto-Hunting With Clones
summary:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

title: Regressing with the King’s Power
summary:
In a world where one's worth is determined by how powerful their skill is, Taehyeon is 35, unawakened, and barely able to scrape by as a pack bearer for monster hunters. But when a mysterious being calling itself “the King” gives him a skill of his own, Taehyeon gets a second chance at life. Now he’s back in high school and armed with Gluttony, a skill that allows him to block and absorb the skills of others! 

---

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=817958)
- [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=10319749)

- [Japanese](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0003336)
- [German](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/returned-by-the-king/list?title_no=7257)

title: Werewolves Going Crazy over Me
summary:
A dangerous love affair with a werewolf.
Single mother Olivia finds Damian dying on the streets and takes him home. Before long, the two are sharing a passionate kiss. Damian soon realizes the side effects of the drug suppressing his werewolf instincts vanish when he is with her. Now he must find a way to keep her around, no matter the cost.

title: The Man Is A Real Dog
summary:
In a fantasy novel, I suddenly became Astel, the younger sister who never appeared. While my brother Cassian is fighting for revenge of the clan, it is my duty to find and deal with the final villain that remains unrevealed even at the end of the series! In order to do that, I must first enter the mansion of the northern duke, where the traitors of the family are hiding. But somehow, I became the 'mate' of duke Anais, a beast and a prime candidate for the ultimate villain. Besides...

"Kiss me now, Astel."

In order to live, I have to communicate with my 'mate' every day, but there’s no such thing in the original!

"Shouldn’t we go see the ocean you like today?"

"I-I don’t think I can. I have to go see Mr. Cassian today."

The duke gritted his teeth with a cold face. I was a little scared when I saw this look on his face. Maybe he’s teething? Because he’s a wild beast!

===

The other day, when I was living under the duke’s care. My brother, Cassian, left his son in my care for a while. However, it seems the duke has been entangled in a huge misunderstanding.

"They will become our child."

"What...?"

"Cassian Gray will disappear from this world right now, so you won't be his bride anymore."

Yes...? Since when did I become Cassian Gray’s bride?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B7%B8-%EB%82%A8%EC%9E%90%EB%8A%94-%EC%A0%9C-%EC%B9%9C%EC%98%A4%EB%B9%A0%EC%9D%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%9A%94-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EB%8B%98/3143), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60549099)

[Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/126242)

title: After Refusing to Donate a Kidney, I Became My Ex’s Little Aunt
The Emperor’s Dog
summary: Five thousand years ago, teenager who had countlessly longed for cultivation, but because of his special physique, was unable to break through the physical training period and enter the next realm of cultivation. He has been practicing from the ancient mythology era to modern day.

title: If Spring Comes
summary: Follows directly after the events in Rules volume 1 Chapter 6 & Extra this continues the tale of Hikaru, Yuki, & friends. A glimpse into Hikaru's life, past, and feelings.

title: Tiger Cub
summary:
The kid next door came back as an adult. What he is aiming for.. is my ♡♡..?!

Choi In-ho, the kid next door who took care of him when he was young, appears in the basement of this ordinary office worker. Due to In-ho's fraud (?), he suddenly ends up living in the basement.

Inho, who has been in love with the kid since his childhood, tries to seduce him, but fails once and for all..

What do we do to flirt with this dull brother?!

title: The Princess in The Henhouse
summary:
"I don't want a world full of only pretty things! I'll become a villainess who will go down in history!!"

For someone who hates a typical "good girl" heroine, I was reincarnated as my favorite otome-game villainess! Since my wish has been granted, I'll be the number one villainess who will go down in history! For that to happen, I need to be strong and intelligent! Also, although I'm just... doing my best, the more of a villainess I become, the more I'm liked by the Prince?! Can I really go down in history―?!

title: I Want to Live Life Effortlessly
summary:
Sugiyama Sora, a reincarnated toddler who can no longer live in the city due to a deficiency of magic elements, is given his last hope for a rural life with his grandparents.
However, when he goes through a tunnel, excited by the slow life he has longed for, he finds himself in an uninhabitable world overrun by giant insects!
The insect-catching he longs to do is with beetles over one meter long.
The walk, which was supposed to be fun, turns into a hunt for dandelions, which sprout even on the human body! 
"Grandma and grandpa, save me~ (tears)"

The frightened Sora, who is turning left and right, not only captures the hearts of the mighty villagers, but for some reason, he even attracts the god of rice paddies. ......?
It will surely remind you of your hometown!A cowardly boy risks his life (?) in this heartwarming fantasy!

title: Oppa, That Must Be A Mistake!
When The Food is Too Spicy
I Don’t Want to Remarry a Tyrant
The Final Boss Who Triggers Massacres, I’ll Make You Happy as a Supporting Character!
The Beloved New Daughter-in-law Of The Wolf Mansion
summary:
The sole heir of the notoriously frail Wolf family, Arsen, has died. The culprits were his father and half-sibling.

They killed the heir with a lie, promising to use the family's healing abilities.

As a result, the family was destroyed, and I was also caught up in it and died.
But then...
"My lady, wake up!"

When I opened my eyes, I had returned to being seven years old, before my death!

"Please let me marry Arsen!"

I can't die unfairly again. I secretly requested a contract marriage with the Wolf family behind my father's back.

title: We Are Absolutely Not Getting Divorced!
The Ugly Lady’s Secret Pouch
summary:
When Yunseol wakes up as "Laila el Este" in the novel, “Bird Cage,” she is horrified.

Though Laila may be beautiful, her beauty is the reason the three male leads obsess over her and make her life a living hell. As such, Laila decides to use her professional makeup skills to become high society’s infamous ugly duckling.

But out of nowhere, she receives a marriage proposal from Duke Montefeltra, a fellow outcast who is ostracized for his unattractive looks.

Will this turn of events help Laila escape the novel’s bad ending once and for all?

title: Couple Relationship
summary:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.

---
Alternate Raws: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8556)

title: Emotional Transference
summary: Su-a, a college freshman in Creative Writing, struggles to understand and express her emotions, leaving her isolated from those around her. When she meets Taeyang, a second-year Sports Coaching student who can sense emotions through touch, their unexpected connection sparks a journey of discovery. Paired for a class assignment that involves a "date," their bond deepens. This is a story about a man who feels too much and a woman who feels too little, and their journey toward emotional growth.

title: Don’t Cling To The Dead Villain
summary:
In a world that resembles an otome game, the villainess is determined to rewrite her fate!

Iris Gray, the daughter of a duke in the Kingdom of Calm, was living the life of a typical noble lady… until one day, she suddenly regained memories of her past life.
There, she realized she had once played a famous romance game — and now, she had been reincarnated as the villainess, destined to be executed for harassing the heroine known as “the Savior.”

With death looming as her scripted ending, Iris resolves to avoid her tragic fate at all costs.
Her first step?
Breaking off her engagement to Prince Elliot, the key figure in her downfall.
But there’s a catch — Elliot is so in love with her that he outright refuses to let her go.

Amid this inner and outer turmoil, a hidden power awakens within Iris — a unique magical gift called “Perception,” which grants her complete control over all forms of magic!

With this newfound ability, Iris realizes she may finally hold the key to reshaping her destiny… and preventing the execution scene that awaits her in the game’s original plot.

Can a so-called villainess truly survive and write herself a new ending?

A tale of romance, fantasy, and a brave rebellion against fate — the journey to flip destiny begins now!

title: The Villainous Emperor and the Beloved Family Plan
Happy Ending just as God Says
Underground of Babel (Official)
summary: Though she's a tomboy with a hangup over her tiny chest, Iori has a crush on Sota Seto, who is the pastry chef at the café where she works. Iori was sure that he wasn't interested in her until one day, he suddenly professes his love for her and goes on to kiss her. She sees him unclothed for the first time - and my, he's huge!! She never would have expected the graceful man's lips to be caressing her all over. It's terribly embarrassing, but she discovers that his you-know-what isn't gross at all…

title: Pet the Little Princess
summary:
A magic revolutionization fantasy about a nonordinary home tutor guiding a little lady! Allen, a humble man who can use abnormal magic techniques, ended up becoming the tutor of lady Tina, who apparently "can't use magic." Thus begin Allen's lessons that crush the concepts of common sense!  
  
From the popular light novel series now comes in manga form!

title: The Merman Trapped in My Lake
summary: “Selvaine, why haven’t you come to see me?” A person, no, a mermaid, calling out to my great-grandfather’s granddaughter who had resembled me. My ancestor, who had treasured the mermaid so, locked him in her lake. What would he have been thinking, waiting for someone who had been dead for over a hundred years. Enduring terrible agony, every day, day after day. Maybe, “I missed you.” … That’s clearly revenge.

title: Your Ryan
summary:
For centuries the Lee and Dai had shared a deep bond in the form of a master-servant relationship which gradually evolved into a strong friendship between the heirs of both families. Therefore true to tradition Dai Xiaodao (aka Dai Xiaoshuang) decides to assume the role of the manservant for Li Qingri (aka childhood friend) in place of her dead brother, Dai Dadao.   
  
To her chagrin, pretending to be a boy was but the tip of the iceberg in terms of the list of challenges that would come her way. On top of having to contain her secret love for Li Qingri who has become her roommate… what's the deal with that sinister-looking senpai (who's always flashing some fish at her) and that sweet-looking female classmate (who's really a carnivore in herbivore's clothing)!   
  
All that aside, what was that mysteriously beautiful scent that Dai Xiaodao got a whiff of when she bumped into the notorious Ye Weien at that secret path? Surely, no matter what the legend says, that obnoxious playboy could not be the man of her destiny!

title: Gold Hands
summary: I'm just his personal caretaker, or is there something more…?

title: Look-Alike Daughter
summary: Beautiful and intelligent, Somyung Gil has tirelessly strived to fulfill her mother's vision of the perfect daughter. However, when her less-than-perfect younger brother is tragically found drowned in a river, doubts plague Somyung's heart. She begins to suspect that their mother might be responsible for the unspeakable act. From then on, her paramount goal becomes escaping her mother's grasp, while all her mother wants is for Somyung to experience the perfect life she herself was denied. Will Somyung ever truly find her freedom?

title: World’s Greatest Senior Disciple
summary:
A senior disciple from a countryside martial academy returns as the world’s best! Dragged into a brutal political war, senior disciple ‘Hyeok Musang’ didn’t return after the bloody war ended. No one knew whether he was still alive for 5 years.

Upon barely returning to his hometown, he found his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy being persecuted and destroyed by a third-rate gang.

He thought he could live peacefully with his fellow members after winning the war but seeing the miserable state of his master and fellow disciples, he was filled with anger and guilt.

With the return of the senior disciple, everyone thought things would get better but only for a moment. Things were still happening in his hometown of Yangzhou County. Was the war really over? The head disciple raises his sword against the dangers threatening his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy.

title: Senior is Bad!
summary:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [VIZ Manga Chapters](https://www.viz.com/vizmanga/chapters/komi-cant-communicate)

title: Back from the Abyss: I Am the Disaster
summary: The Immortal Emperor family was wiped out overnight, and the young master Li Chen was thrown into the most mysterious and dangerous abyss! Eight years later, he broke out of the abyss, the empress in his left hand, and the gods and demons in his right hand, and everything he went was

title: I Became the Rabbit Heroine’s Stepmother
summary: Gloria wakes to find that she has become the infamous evil stepmother of a cute little werebunny?! She has mysteriously entered a fantastical world of knights and werebeasts, but not as its main character. Now, she must prove that she is not the terrible person everyone thinks she is. It won’t be easy, but she has help. The World Tree’s butterfly guardians will aid her in winning the trust of her new husband and stepdaughter.

title: The regressor only protects me
summary:
“Let the survival game begin!”

Designated as a disruptive species in the universe’s ecology, humanity must now participate in the ‘league’ under the watchful eye of the universal administrators. 

Jin Jae-hui, sent back in time during the final stage of the game, arrives at one conclusion - only Kang Sion has the power to lead humanity to victory.

title: Loving Summer Sky
summary: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.

title: Close and Secretive
summary: On that day, I was going to confess to you. Choi Ji-young, an unidentified woman who accidentally encountered her on Ulleungdo Island. Sunwoo Hyun keeps bothering Ji-young. Two people who are attracted to each other even in a short period of time. Then one day, Ji-young suddenly disappears. Without a trace. “It’s been a while, Hyun. Aren’t you going to say hello?” Ji-young, who could not be found no matter how much she visited, became the “Choi Ji-an” and appeared in four years. That’s also for Hyun to protect. “With this time, there is no Choi Ji-young I knew. So, just delete it too.”

title: The Devil’s Body Temperature
summary:
Bei Yao, a cheerful four-year-old, was reborn into 1996 and found herself living next door to a boy destined to become a formidable villain in the future. This boy, Pei Chuan, was only five at the time, confined to a wheelchair and deeply insecure.

Years later, when they were teenagers, Bei Yao had blossomed into the school's most admired beauty. Despite her popularity, Pei Chuan remained guarded and distant. When Bei Yao confessed her feelings for him, he reacted with a mixture of fear and longing.

Having known each other for two lifetimes, Bei Yao was determined to understand the complexities of Pei Chuan's character. As their bond deepened, she discovered a sensitive and vulnerable soul beneath his tough exterior. Their story is one of a healing love that blossoms between childhood sweethearts, as Bei Yao's warmth gradually melts away Pei Chuan's emotional barriers.

title: Disastrous Necromancer
summary:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer! Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges. What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?

---

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/18819/)

title: That summers promise once again
summary: Minami is now one of the most popular young actresses, rising to the top with her natural beauty and charm. However, there's one thing that continues to trouble her. Back in middle school, she was in a serious traffic accident that left her severely injured and took a full year to recover from. As a result of the accident, she also lost all memories related to it. Since then, she has been having the same dream every single night. In that dream, someone gently whispers to her: "Don’t forget the promise we made that summer…
